description: Developed interactive, high-traffic user interfaces using Angular and React, focusing on performance, responsiveness, and cross-browser compatibility.
Collaborated within large, cross-functional teams to align technical implementation with business, design, and usability requirements.
Integrated frontend features with backend services built on Node.js and NestJS, ensuring reliable data exchange and consistent application behavior.
Used Docker-based environments to standardize local development and deployment workflows across distributed teams.
Actively participated in code reviews, technical discussions, and incremental refactoring efforts to improve legacy codebases and overall system stability.
